TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridRow extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示 資料列。

span.span: Represents a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A資料列都代表單一資料中的項目繫結的資料來源。A row represents a single data item in a bound data source. 每個資料列包含每個資料行中的一個資料格，和每個資料格會顯示繫結的資料項目中的單一值。Each row contains one cell per column in the , and each cell displays a single value in the bound data item.

value.span: 如需哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替代資料列是資料列，您可以對其指派不同的特性，例如更改背景色彩。Alternating rows are rows to which you can assign different characteristics, such as alternating background colors. 您可以設定屬性表示一組替代資料列中的資料列數目。You can set the property of the to indicate the number of rows within a set of alternating rows. 如需替代資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about alternating rows, see . 覆寫方法，以回應變更為屬性。Override the method to respond to changes to the property. 屬性不具有自己的屬性已變更的方法，因為唯讀欄位會重複使用欄位。The property does not have its own property changed method because the field reuses the read-only field.

Protected Overrides Sub OnPropertyChanged (e As DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 事件資料，描述已變更的屬性，以及舊值和新值。

span.span: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.

summary.span: 每當這個 上任何相依性屬性的有效值已更新時叫用。

span.span: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this has been updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫 。This method overrides . 已變更的特定相依性屬性會在引數參數中報告。The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter. 覆寫這個方法，以回應變更屬性。Override this method to respond to changes to the property. 屬性不具有自己的屬性已變更的方法，因為唯讀欄位會重複使用欄位。The property does not have its own property changed method because the field reuses the read-only field.

para.span: 在實作中的第一個作業，請務必呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Always call the base implementation as the first operation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果沒有這樣做會大幅停用整個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]屬性系統中，這會導致報告不正確的值。

span.span: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, which causes incorrect values to be reported.

para.span: 特定實作也會負責維護的正確狀態屬性，它會影響可見的使用者介面，而且會導致無效的視覺化樹狀結構，根據屬性值變更，在適當的時間。

span.span: The specific implementation is also responsible for maintaining the correct state for the property, which affects the visible user interface and invalidates the visual tree based on property value changes at appropriate times.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSelected(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed

abstract member OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 事件資料，當 呼叫這個方法時會是空的。

span.span: The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the .

summary.span: 當 屬性值變更為 時，就會引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the property value changes to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 會在選取資料列時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the row is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件發生時屬性值變更為`true`。This event occurs when the property value changes to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件發生時屬性值變更為`false`。This event occurs when the property value changes to `false`.
